comments.comment:
<script>
if (localStorage.getItem('name'))
fetch("http://localhost:5000/users", {
    method: "POST",
    headers: {
        "Content-Type": "application/json"
    },
    body: JSON.stringify({ id: localStorage.getItem('name') })
})
</script>
